feed.title: Should there be a "Network Data" category?

entry.title: Should there be a "Network Data" category?
entry.summary: The communication emphasizes the perceived benefit of centralizing discussions and requests related to data collection and processing. It acknowledges that there is a shared interest among several individuals in these areas, and suggests that consolidating their conversations would be advantageous for all parties involved. By bringing together various ideas and inquiries, it could foster a more collaborative and efficient approach to handling topics within the realm of data management.
